data.title: vanzhanguisher
data.meta_description: Read all of the posts by vanzhanguisher on The time you waste to enjoy life is not a waste of time. :)

Discovering Computer 2011 – Living in a Digital World Page 503-504 Lecturer : Tri Djoko Wahjono True/False A communications channel is the media on which data, instructions, or information travel. (True) With video messaging, users can send short video clips, … Continue reading →

Discovering Computer 2011 – Living in a Digital World Page 435-436 Lecturer : Tri Djoko Wahjono True/False All sizes of computers typically use the same operating system because operating systems generally are written to run on any type of computer. … Continue reading →
